content: through b 6 single_crochet 8 double_crochet round 17 b skip 1 st behind each fpedc no increases are made in this round if this round is crocheted in 1 color all st are crocheted in that single color if this round is crocheted in 2 colors the treble_crochet is crocheted in the second color chain 1 4 single_crochet fpedc around the 1st double_crochet of round 15 single_crochet in the indicated st in the 1st photo below fpedc single_crochet fpedc 4 single_crochet treble_crochet in the fl of the double_crochet of round 14 indicated in the 2nd photo below x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through a 10 single_crochet 3 fpedc 1 treble_crochet © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 13 round 18 a for all rounds hereafter where you find instructions in bold writing if the round is crocheted in 1 color all stitches are crocheted in that single color if the round is crocheted in 2 colors bold writing is crocheted with the second color add the 2nd color in this round in the pull through of the 2nd single_crochet before the decrease chain 1 4 double_crochet the 1st double_crochet is made in the double_crochet straight below 2 single_crochet the 1st single_crochet is made in the next fpedc of round 17 decrease in the st s indicated in the 1st photo below 2 single_crochet the 2nd single_crochet is made in the 3rd fpedc of round 17 4 double_crochet 3 single_crochet the 2nd single_crochet is made in the treble_crochet of round 17 the 1st and 3rd single_crochet are increases x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st double_crochet and pull through b 7 single_crochet 8 double_crochet 1 decrease round 19 b for placement of the double_crochet s in this round see the 3rd photo below chain 1 3 single_crochet fpedc around the fpedc of round 17 single_crochet fpsc loosely around the decrease of round 18 single_crochet in the next st which will be hiding behind the fpsc a bit indicated in the 2nd photo below fpedc around the next fpedc of round 17 4 single_crochet double_crochet fpedc around the treble_crochet of round 17 double_crochet single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through a 10 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 fpsc 3 fpedc © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 14 round 20 a chain 1 single_crochet double_crochet 5 single_crochet double_crochet 2 single_crochet double_crochet 3 single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through b 12 single_crochet 4 double_crochet your work might cup a bit at this point no reason for concern it will flatten out in the next rounds round 21 b and c for all rounds hereafter where you find instructions with both bold and blue writing if the round is crocheted in 1 color all writing is crocheted in the same single color if the round is crocheted in 2 colors bold writing is crocheted in
